name: Possession Academy
description: Angelica Thana is ready to continue on with her regular high school life - prepared to keep her head down and perform well. With the sudden passing of both of her parents, her future gets derailed. For reasons she cannot understand, the will of her parents asks that she instead enrolls in Babylon Reform School. The school has an infamous reputation for housing some of the most dangerous and mentally unstable children in the country. After enrolling, she quickly discovers the truth of the school: it serves as a containment and rehabilitation facility for those who have been possessed by demons. With dread pooling in her stomach, Angelica soon realizes exactly why her parents had enrolled her there.
